Item.Name: ESPN Wide World of Sports Grill
Item.Content:
ESPN Wide World of Sports Grill in ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex, ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for ESPN Wide World of Sports Grill

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/244731.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Watch the game on one of 7 HDTVs and wolf down some wings! Score hot or cold sandwiches, burgers, soups, salads, pizza, nachos and more. A full bar is available, as is patio seating with 2 TVs. Snap a photo at the Sports Center desk!  Please note: dining hours are subject to change based on events.
  Cuisine: American
  Details: Disney Dining Plan Accepted

ESPN Wide World of Sports Grill Bar in ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex, ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for ESPN Wide World of Sports Grill Bar

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/16668647.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Watch the game on widescreen HDTVs and wolf down some wings! Score hot or cold sandwiches, burgers, soups, salads, pizza, nachos and more. A full bar is available, as is patio seating with more TVs. Snap a photo at the Sports Center desk! Please note: dining hours are subject to change based on events.
  Cuisine: American

Item.Name: HP Field House - Wetzel's Pretzels
Item.Content:
HP Field House - Wetzel's Pretzels in ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex, ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for HP Field House - Wetzel's Pretzels

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/16668800.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Get your game on with freshly baked grub! Indulge in a variety of zesty pretzel-inspired treats like the Wetzel Dog—a savory pretzel-wrapped hot dog—or Wetzel Bitz, bite-sized pretzel pieces in both original and Sinful Cinnamon flavors. Please note: dining hours are subject to change based on events.
  Cuisine: American

Item.Name: VISA Athletic Center - Wetzel's Pretzels
Item.Content:
J Center - Wetzel's Pretzels in ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex, ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for J Center - Wetzel's Pretzels

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/16668801.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Take a timeout with a mouthwatering snack! Enjoy hot and tasty pretzels—in original and cinnamon flavors—with savory and sweet dips like cheddar cheese and sweet caramel. Fresh lemonade, fountain drinks and bottled water are also available. Please note: dining hours are subject to change based on events.
  Cuisine: American
